name: Remittances
description: Bilateral flows of remittances between pairs of countries, 2010-2012
source: World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook (estimates of bilateral remittance flows)
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Humanitarian assistance
description: Bilateral flows of humanitarian assistance between countries, 2000-2012

name: Foreign Direct Investment
description: Breakdown of financing types for FDI in developing countries, or a subset of developing countries (based on data availability).
source: Sources vary by country: Denmark: Denmark NationalBank (breakdown data only available for Africa, Turkey, Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, India, China, Malaysia and Thailand) France: Banque de France statistics (data are for the 43 developing countries with data on modalities from the Banque de France, representing around 97% of total investment in developing countries) Germany: Deutche Bundesbank (data are for the 22 developing countries with data on modalities from the Deutche Bundesbank, representing around 58% of total investment in developing countries) United Kingdom: Office of National Statistics (data are for investment in Africa, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Panama, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand) United States: Bureau of Economic Affairs (data are based on regional totals, with figures for investment in developed countries subtracted where available - totals may not exactly match total investment figures presented elsewhere)
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Profits on FDI
description: Outflows of profits on FDI leaving the country
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Illicit finance
description: Estimates of illicit finance outflows
calculation: Estimates use GFI's Hot Money Narrow (HMN) Method This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Long-term debt
description: Capital repayments on outstanding long term debt

name: Trade mispricing
description: Estimates of trade mispricing outflows
calculation: Estimates use GFI's Gross Excluding Reversals (GER) Method of estimating trade mispricing flows This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Government spending per person (2011 PPP$)
description: Government spending per person, 2011 PPP$, net of general budget support ODA and disbursements on debt to the public sector
source: Development Initiatives, based on IMF WEO, OECD DAC, World Bank
calculation: Calculated from IMF WEO data on government spending as a proportion of GDP. Receipts of general budget support ODA and disbursements on public debt are subtracted from total government spending before dividing by the population, to avoid double counting when comparing with international resource flows.

name: Government spending
description: Total government spending, 2012 USD, net of general budget support ODA and disbursements on debt to the public sector
source: Development Initiatives, based on IMF WEO, OECD DAC, World Bank
calculation: Calculated from IMF WEO data on government spending as a proportion of GDP. Receipts of general budget support ODA and disbursements on public debt are subtracted from total government spending to avoid double counting when comparing with international resource flows.

name: Gross Domestic Product (2005 US$)
description: GDP (Constant 2005 US$)

name: Gross Domestic Product (current US$)
description: GDP (Current US$)

name: Gross National Income (2005 US$)
description: GDP (Constant 2005 US$)

name: Gross National Income (current US$)
description: GNI (Current US$)

name: Foreign Direct Investment
description: Inward Net Foreign Direct Investment
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Profits on FDI
description: Earnings on FDI returning back to the source country
source: Sources vary by country: Finland: Bank of Finland Statistics (data only covers earnings on FDI in Africa, Mexico, Brazil, China and Malaysia) UK: Office of National Statistics (data only covers earnings on FDI in Africa, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Panama, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, and Thailand) US: Bureau of Economic Analysis
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Humanitarian assistance
description: Inward humanitarian assistance, 2000-2012

name: Remittances
description: Inward remittances
source: World Bank migration and remittances factbook
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Short-term debt
description: Net inward disbursements on short-term debt
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Long-term debt
description: Net inward disbursements on long-term debt
source: Development Initiatives calculations based on World Bank International Debt Statistics
calculation: Disbursements on ODA and OOF loans have been subtracted from the official component of long-term debt disbursements. See methodology for details. This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Official Development Assistance
description: Gross ODA disbursements, all donors

name: Other Official Flows
description: Gross disbursements of other official flows, all donors

name: Portfolio equity
description: Net inward portfolio equity

name: Total international resource flows
description: Total international resource flows received
source: Development Initiatives calculations based on numerous sources
calculation: Is the sum of net inflows of FDI, remittances, gross ODA, gross OOFs, portfolio equity, net inflows of short-term debt, long-term debt, humanitarian assistance and peacekeeping. This series aims to estimate gross inflows so negative net inflows are excluded (set to zero). Data on peacekeeping is only available for 2012 and humanitarian assistance (excluding that reported as ODA to the OECD DAC) is only available from 2000-2012.

name: Tax revenue
description: Tax revenue as a proportion of GDP

name: Official Development Assistance
description: Annual country breakdown of ODA by (DI) sector and by (DI) aid-bundle
source: CRS transactions, DI sector grouping, DI Aid bundle grouping

name: Official Development Assistance
description: Annual country breakdown of ODA by (DI) sector

name: Development finance institutions
description: Estimated approvals by bilateral DFIs to developing countries, excluding operations reported as ODA or OOFs
source: Development Initiatives, Investments to End Poverty
calculation: Figures are net of activities reported as ODA or OOFs to the OECD DAC

name: Development finance institutions
description: Estimated disbursements by bilateral DFIs to developing countries, excluding operations reported as ODA or OOFs
source: Development Initiatives, Investments to End Poverty

name: Foreign Direct Investment
description: FDI in developing countries by source country
source: Development Initiatives calculations based on UNCTAD Bilateral FDI database and national sources
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012

name: Private Development Assistance
description: Private development assistance (PDA) from DAC countries to developing countries
source: Investments to End Poverty, Development Initiatives based on OECD DAC, Hudson Institute Center for Global Prosperity, Australian Council for International Development, Canada Council for International Co-operation, ONG Livre Ouvert, Coordination Sud, Observatoire de la Fondation de France, Admical, D�chas, Coordinadora ONGD, Charities Aid Foundation, Nuffield Foundation, USAID �Report of Voluntary Agencies Engaged in Overseas Relief and Development, New Zealand Council for International Development, Foundation Center

name: Remittances
description: Remittances to developing countries by source country
source: Development Initiatives calculations based on World Bank Migration and Remittances Factbook
calculation: This dataset uses OECD DAC deflators for countries included in their deflators dataset and deflators calculated from IMF WEO GDP figures for all other countries. BASE YEAR = 2012. Note that estimates of bilateral remittance flows are only available for 2010-2012

name: Poverty gap at $1.25 day
description: Poverty gap is the mean shortfall from the poverty line (counting the nonpoor as having zero shortfall), expressed as a percentage of the poverty line. This measure reflects the depth of poverty as well as its incidence.

name: Poverty gap at $2 day
description: Poverty gap is the mean shortfall from the poverty line (counting the nonpoor as having zero shortfall), expressed as a percentage of the poverty line. This measure reflects the depth of poverty as well as its incidence.
